pads.musicPlayer

Class Mp3Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • javazoom.jl.player.advanced.PlaybackListener
      • pads.musicPlayer.Mp3Player

  • public class Mp3Player
extends javazoom.jl.player.advanced.PlaybackListener

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Mp3Player(java.lang.String... mp3s)
      Constructor for the Mp3Player, which expects a zero or more file names with valid mp3.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Mp3Player

        public Mp3Player(java.lang.String... mp3s)
          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                 pads.musicPlayer.exceptions.Mp3PlayerException
        Constructor for the Mp3Player, which expects a zero or more file names with valid mp3.
        Parameters:
        mp3s - : Zero or more strings with file names of mp3s to be played
        Throws:
        pads.musicPlayer.exceptions.Mp3PlayerException - : Thrown either when the file is not found, or is not valid mp3, or when the Player could not be created
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - : Thrown when some file is not found

    • Method Detail

      • play

        public void play()
          throws pads.musicPlayer.exceptions.Mp3PlayerException
        The method to start playing the mp3 files. This method starts a thread, which can be stopped using stop. The method plays all mp3s in the list starting from the beginning. If there is no file to be played, it does nothing.
        Throws:
        pads.musicPlayer.exceptions.Mp3PlayerException - when the Player is already playing

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Method that stops playing the current song, if some is being played.

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.String... songs)
         throws pads.musicPlayer.exceptions.Mp3InvalidFileException
        Adds a list of files to the queue of mp3s to be played
        Parameters:
        songs - the songs to be added
        Throws:
        pads.musicPlayer.exceptions.Mp3InvalidFileException - when some file does not exist or is invalid

      • isValidMp3File

        public static boolean isValidMp3File(java.lang.String mp3)
        Returns whether the file represented by mp3 is a valid mp3 file
        Parameters:
        mp3 - the file to be checked
        Returns:
        true if the file exists and it is a valid mp3 file, false otherwise

      • getDuration

        public static double getDuration(java.lang.String file)
                          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Returns the duration of the current mp3 file in seconds
        Parameters:
        file - a string with the mp3 file
        Returns:
        The duration id the current mp3 file in seconds
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - when the file does not exist
